content: The course is slotted for Tue Q3/Q4 and the usual suspects (Jean, Brett, Rik) aren't available. Any other candidates who'd be available that timeslot in Baltimore?
I will be there, but am not likely the best candidate for the material. If no other, I can give it a try.
If we're desperate then I can probably do it :)
hold on - I'm giving a clinicial talk on tuesday - not sure of the time...
So there is a clash - but happy to do it if it can be moved from Q3/4
I'm available and happy to help out.
